tool.name: Dataset Exporter
tool.command:
python '$__tool_directory__/dataset_export.py' --email '$__user_email__' #for $d in $datasets #set tags = ','.join(str(t.value) for t in $d.tags) --dataset '${d}' --dataset_name '${d.element_identifier}' --dataset_extension '${d.ext}' --dataset_tags '${tags}' --history_id '${d.hid}' --history_name '${d.dataset.history.name}' #end for
#if str( $options.selection_mode ) == "defaults": --file_pattern '${options.predefined_file_pattern}' #else: --file_pattern '${options.file_pattern}' #end if --log '$log'

param.name: predefined_file_pattern
param.label: Predefined locations (see below for the patterns used)
param.help: Use "Scratch" if you know how to use the commandline. Use the "Group Share" if you want to browse the files from your desktop.

param.name: file_pattern
param.label: File pattern (see below for placeholders}
param.help: Where the file needs to placed and how the name should be constructed.

tool.help:
**Predefined locations**: - Scratch: /scratch/{username}/galaxy_transfer/{history}/{name}.{ext} - Group Share: /g/{group}/galaxy_transfer/{email}/{history}/{name}.{ext} - WaveletMovies: **only for Aulehla users**
**File Pattern** Available placeholders are:
- {username}: your username - {email}: your email address - {group}: your **primary** unix group - {id}: Dataset id - {name}: Dataset name - {ext}: Dataset extension (e.g. bam, fa) - {history}: history name - {tags}: all tags on the dataset seperated by a dash e.g. myfasta_tag1-tag2.fa - {hid}: Galaxy history id
E.g. "/g/{group}/{username}/{history}/{name}_{tags}.{ext}" will become: "/g/gbcs/scholtal/My_History/myfasta_tag1-tag2.fa"
**Note:** File paths cannot contain any whitespaces, they will be converted to underscores(_)
